alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 25 at 9:28PM CDT until July 25 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LOUP AND NORTHEASTERN BLAINE COUNTIES... At 926 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 12 miles east of Brewster, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 183 near mile marker 134. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
